text: National Route 45 is a national highway in South Korea connects between Seosan and Gapyeong County. It was established on 14 March 1981.대통령령 제10247호 일반국도노선지정령, 1981년 3월 14일 일부개정. ==Main stopovers== ; South Chungcheong Province * Seosan - Yesan County - Asan ; Gyeonggi Province * Pyeongtaek - Anseong - Yongin - Gwangju - Hanam - Namyangju - Gapyeong County ==Major Intersections== * (■): Motorway IS: Intersection, IC: Interchange === South Chungcheong Province === {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%; text-align: center;" |- !
